sentences.sContent: Some biodegradable polymers such as polyesters hae already been employed as excipients in pharmacology.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some biodegradable polymers such as polyesters hae already been employed as excipients in pharmacology.
sentences.sCn: 一些生物可降解聚合物，例如聚酯，已经作为辅料应用在药理学中。

sentences.sContent: A9 To master the basic knowledge of the area of biomedicine production, including pharmaceutical technology, pharmacology, pharmaceutics, Pharmaceutical Analysis, etc.
sentences.sContent_eng: A9 To master the basic knowledge of the area of biomedicine production, including pharmaceutical technology, pharmacology, pharmaceutics, Pharmaceutical Analysis, etc.
sentences.sCn: A9掌握生物制药工艺学、药理学、药剂学、药物分析等生物工程制药领域的基本知识；

sentences.sContent: Baroness GREenfield, professor of pharmacology at Oxford University, believes the growth of internet 'friendships' – as well as GREater use of computer games – could effectively 'rewire' the brain.
sentences.sContent_eng: Baroness GREenfield, professor of pharmacology at Oxford University, believes the growth of internet 'friendships' – as well as GREater use of computer games – could effectively 'rewire' the brain.
sentences.sCn: 牛津大学药理学教授贝洛尼斯•格林菲尔德认为，网络“友谊”的增长以及电脑游戏的风行，会有效地“改装”人的大脑。

words.tran: 遗传药理学；药物基因学

trans.tranCn: 药理学， 药物学； 药理
trans.tranOther: the scientific study of drugs and medicines
